# @miozu/jera

> Zero-dependency, AI-first component library for Svelte 5. Pure modern CSS with Base16 design tokens. 85 components across 7 categories.

## Quick Start

```bash
pnpm add @miozu/jera    # or link:../jera for monorepo
```

```svelte
import { Button, Input, Modal, Tabs } from '@miozu/jera';
import { getTheme } from '@miozu/jera';
import { clickOutside } from '@miozu/jera/actions';
import '@miozu/jera/tokens';
```

Full API reference: [llms-full.txt](./llms-full.txt) | Component manifest: [components.json](./components.json)

## Design Tokens (Base16)

- [Colors](./src/tokens/colors.css): Miozu Base16 palette (base00-base0F)
- [Spacing](./src/tokens/spacing.css): 4px-based spacing scale
- [Typography](./src/tokens/typography.css): Font scales and weights
- [Effects](./src/tokens/effects.css): Shadows, radius, transitions, z-index

| Token | Role | Dark | Light |
|-------|------|------|-------|
| base00 | Background | #0f1419 | #ffffff |
| base01 | Surface | #1a1f26 | #f8f9fa |
| base02 | Border/Selection | #2c3038 | #e9ecef |
| base05 | Text | #e2e8f0 | #212529 |
| base08 | Error/Red | #e06c75 | #dc3545 |
| base0B | Success/Green | #98c379 | #28a745 |
| base0D | Primary/Blue | #61afef | #007bff |

## Active Components

Used in production across dash.selify.ai, admin.selify.ai, and miozu.com.

### Primitives
- [Button](./src/components/primitives/Button.svelte): 8 variants (primary|secondary|outline|ghost|success|danger|warning|info), 4 sizes, polymorphic (a/button), loading state
- [Badge](./src/components/primitives/Badge.svelte): 7 variants, 3 sizes, optional click and icon slots
- [StatusBadge](./src/components/primitives/StatusBadge.svelte): 15 semantic status variants (pending, approved, connected, error, etc.)
- [Divider](./src/components/primitives/Divider.svelte): Horizontal/vertical with optional label
- [Avatar](./src/components/primitives/Avatar.svelte): Image/initials with status indicator (online|offline|busy|away), 6 sizes
- [Stat](./src/components/primitives/Stat.svelte): Metric display with optional progress bar and status coloring

- [ThemeSelect](./src/components/primitives/ThemeSelect.svelte): Three-option theme selector (light/dark/system), segmented or dropdown

## Utilities
- [cn()](./src/utils/cn.svelte.js): Class name concatenation with falsy filtering
- [cv()](./src/utils/cn.svelte.js): Class variants for type-safe variant composition
- [getTheme()](./src/utils/reactive.svelte.js): SSR-safe theme singleton — `getTheme().init()`, `.toggle()`, `.isDark`
- [createActiveChecker()](./src/utils/navigation.svelte.js): Route matching utility for nav items

## Actions
- [clickOutside](./src/actions/index.js): Detect clicks outside element
- [focusTrap](./src/actions/index.js): Trap focus within element
- [escapeKey](./src/actions/index.js): Handle escape key press
- [portal](./src/actions/index.js): Render in different DOM location

## Rules for AI

1. Svelte 5 runes only ($state, $derived, $props) — no legacy stores
2. Single $props() call per component
3. Use Base16 tokens (var(--color-baseXX)) — no hardcoded hex
4. Zero external dependencies — only Svelte as devDep
5. All styles are scoped pure CSS — no Tailwind, no CSS frameworks
6. Components must work in any pure CSS environment
7. Forward rest props via {...rest} on the root element
8. Use $bindable() for two-way binding props (value, checked, open, collapsed)
